
import PartialFieldRefreference from "./valueFrom/fieldRef_reference.mdx"
import PartialResourceFieldRefreference from "./valueFrom/resourceFieldRef_reference.mdx"
import PartialConfigMapKeyRefreference from "./valueFrom/configMapKeyRef_reference.mdx"
import PartialSecretKeyRefreference from "./valueFrom/secretKeyRef_reference.mdx"


<details className="config-field" data-expandable="true">
<summary>

##### `fieldRef` <span className="config-field-required" data-required="false">required</span> <span className="config-field-type">object</span> <span className="config-field-default"></span> <span className="config-field-enum"></span> {#spec-clusterRef-podTemplate-spec-env-valueFrom-fieldRef}

Selects a field of the pod: supports metadata.name, metadata.namespace, `metadata.labels['(KEY)']`, `metadata.annotations['(KEY)']`,
spec.nodeName, spec.serviceAccountName, status.hostIP, status.podIP, status.podIPs.

</summary>

<PartialFieldRefreference />


</details>



<details className="config-field" data-expandable="true">
<summary>

##### `resourceFieldRef` <span className="config-field-required" data-required="false">required</span> <span className="config-field-type">object</span> <span className="config-field-default"></span> <span className="config-field-enum"></span> {#spec-clusterRef-podTemplate-spec-env-valueFrom-resourceFieldRef}

Selects a resource of the container: only resources limits and requests
(limits.cpu, limits.memory, limits.ephemeral-storage, requests.cpu, requests.memory and requests.ephemeral-storage) are currently supported.

</summary>

<PartialResourceFieldRefreference />


</details>



<details className="config-field" data-expandable="true">
<summary>

##### `configMapKeyRef` <span className="config-field-required" data-required="false">required</span> <span className="config-field-type">object</span> <span className="config-field-default"></span> <span className="config-field-enum"></span> {#spec-clusterRef-podTemplate-spec-env-valueFrom-configMapKeyRef}

Selects a key of a ConfigMap.

</summary>

<PartialConfigMapKeyRefreference />


</details>



<details className="config-field" data-expandable="true">
<summary>

##### `secretKeyRef` <span className="config-field-required" data-required="false">required</span> <span className="config-field-type">object</span> <span className="config-field-default"></span> <span className="config-field-enum"></span> {#spec-clusterRef-podTemplate-spec-env-valueFrom-secretKeyRef}

Selects a key of a secret in the pod's namespace

</summary>

<PartialSecretKeyRefreference />


</details>
